Wish I could afford a Frank's box, they sound really nice, and seem to have=
 
 depth to them too. sf

ern Standard Time,

ow]  
No improvement eh? What about the video box I made years  before my a=
nal 
critic and his cronies even heard of EVP. I used the  random sweep mod=
e to 
sweep a tuner removed from an old VCR, it no longer  function because=
 the  TV 
broadcast format has been changed, I have no  idea how to program=
 a new cable 
tuner to sweep. Maybe the genious out there  can do it, but p=
robly not, 
everyone knows the entities are just mindless  zombies that can=
 not possibly 
manipulate video. Note the date, 2007, long  before my more =
anal critics 
became aware of the boxes.  Before Chaple's hack "discovery".=
 

Three faces in one, just  some trick of the eye, can't be spirit. 
 
F-S=
